CustomField.formula: DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(First_Visit__c)) + (FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(First_Visit__c)) / 365) + 1), MONTH(DATEVALUE(First_Visit__c)), IF(AND(DAY(DATEVALUE(First_Visit__c)) = 29,MONTH(DATEVALUE(First_Visit__c) ) = 02) , 28, DAY(DATEVALUE(First_Visit__c))))
CustomField.label: First Visit Anniversary
